name: Akabeko
description: Your first Attack each combat deals 8 additional damage.

name: Anchor
description: At the start of each combat, gain 10 Block.

name: Ancient Tea Set
description: Whenever you enter a Rest Site, start the next combat with 2 additional Energy.

name: Art of War
description: If you do not play Attacks during your turn, gain an extra Energy next turn.

name: Astrolabe
description: Upon pickup, choose and Transform 3 cards, then Upgrade them.

name: Bag of Marbles
description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

name: Bag of Preparation
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Bird-Faced Urn
description: Whenever you play a Power card, heal 2 HP.

name: Black Blood
description: *Replaces burning blood* At the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Black Star
description: Elites now drop 2 Relics when defeated.

name: Blood Vial
description: At the start of each combat, heal 2 HP.

name: Bloody Idol
description: Whenever you gain Gold, heal 5 HP. (From Forgotten Altar Event)

name: Blue Candle
description: Whenever you Curse a card, you may play it. If you do, Exhaust it and lose 1 HP.

name: Bottled Flame
description: Upon pickup, choose an Attack. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Bottled Lightning
description: Upon pickup, choose a Skill. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Bottled Tornado
description: Upon pickup, choose a Power. Start each combat with this card in your hand.

name: Brimstone
description: At the start of your turn, gain 2 Strength and ALL enemies gain 1 Strength.

name: Bronze Scales
description: Whenever you take damage, deal 3 damage back.

name: Burning Blood
description: At the end of combat, heal 6 HP.

name: Busted Crown
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. On card reward screens, you have 2 fewer cards to choose from.

name: Calipers
description: At the start of your turn, lose 15 Block rather than all of your Block.

name: Calling Bell
description: Obtain a special Curse and 3 Relics

name: Captain's Wheel
description: At the start of your 3rd turn, gain 18 Block.

name: Cauldron
description: Upon pickup, brew 5 potions.

name: Centennial Puzzle
description: The first time you lose HP each combat, draw 3 cards.

name: Ceramic Fish
description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, gain 9 Gold.

name: Champion Belt
description: Whenever you apply Vulnerable, also apply 1 Weak.

name: Charon's Ashes
description: Whenever you defeat an enemy, deal 3 damage to all enemies.

name: Chemical X
description: Whenever you play a cost X card, its effects are increased by 2.

name: Cloak Clasp
description: At the end of your turn, gain 1 Block for each card in your hand.

name: Clockwork Souvenir
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Artifact.

name: Coffee Dripper
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Rest at Rest Sites.

name: Cracked Core
description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 Lightning.

name: Cultist Headpiece
description: You feel more talkative. (From Face Trader Event)

name: Cursed Key
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Whenever you open a chest, become Cursed.

name: Damaru
description: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Mantra.

name: Darkstone Periapt
description: Whenever you obtain a Curse, increase your Max HP by 6.

name: Data Disk
description: Start each combat with 1 Focus.

name: Dead Branch
description: Whenever you Exhaust a card, add a random card to your hand.

name: Dolly's Mirror
description: Upon pickup, obtain an additional copy of a card in your deck.

name: Dream Catcher
description: Whenever you rest, you may add a card to your deck.

name: Du-Vu Doll
description: For each Curse in your deck, start each combat with 1 additional Strength.

name: Duality
description: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Dexterity.

name: Ectoplasm
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer gain Gold.

name: Emotion Chip
description: If you lost HP during the previous turn, trigger the passive ability of all Orbs at the start of your turn.

name: Empty Cage
description: Upon pickup, remove 2 cards from your deck.

name: Enchiridion
description: Start each combat with a random Power card in your hand. It costs 0 until the end of the turn. (From Cursed Tome Event)

name: Eternal Feather
description: For every 3 cards in your deck, heal 3 HP whenever you enter a Rest Site.

name: Face of Cleric
description: Raise your Max HP by 1 after each combat. (From Face Trader Event)

name: Fossilized Helix
description: Prevent the next 5 times you would lose HP in combat.

name: Frozen Core
description: *Replaces Cracked Core* If you end your turn with empty Orb slots, Channel 1 Frost Orb.

name: Frozen Egg
description: Whenever you add a Power card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Frozen Egg 2.0
description: Whenever you add a Skill to your deck, upgrade it.

name: Frozen Eye
description: When viewing your Draw Pile, the cards are now shown in order.

name: Fusion Hammer
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer Smith at Rest Sites.

name: Gambling Chip
description: At the start of combat, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.

name: Ginger
description: You can no longer become Weakened.

name: Girya
description: You can now gain Strength at Rest Sites. (3 times max)

name: Gold-Plated Cables
description: Your rightmost Orb triggers its passive an additional time.

name: Golden Eye
description: Whenever you Scry, Scry 2 additional cards.

name: Golden Idol
description: Enemies drop 25% more Gold. (From Golden Idol Event)

name: Gremlin Horn
description: Whenever an enemy dies, draw 1 card and gain 1 Energy.

name: Gremlin Visage
description: Start each combat with 1 Weak. (From Face Trader Event)

name: Hand Drill
description: Whenever you break an enemy's Block, apply 2 Vulnerable.

name: Happy Flower
description: Every 3 turns, gain 1 Energy.

name: Holy Water
description: *Replaces Pure Water* At the start of each combat, add 3 Miracles to your hand.

name: Horn Cleat
description: At the start of your second turn, gain 14 Block.

name: Hovering Kite
description: The first time you discard a card each turn, gain 1 Energy.

name: Ice Cream
description: Energy is now conserved between turns.

name: Incense Burner
description: Every 6 turns, gain 1 Intangible.

name: Ink Bottle
description: Every 10 cards you play, draw 1 card.

name: Inserter
description: Every 2 turns, gain 1 Orb slot.

name: Juzu Bracelet
description: Regular enemy combats are no longer encountered in ? rooms.

name: Kunai
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Lantern
description: Gain 1 Energy on the first turn of each combat.

name: Lee's Waffle
description: Raise your Max HP by 7 and heal all of your HP.

name: Letter Opener
description: Every time you play 3 Skills in a single turn, deal 5 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Lizard Tail
description: If you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once).

name: Magic Flower
description: Healing is 50% more effective during combat.

name: Mango
description: Upon pickup, increase your Max HP by 14.

name: Mark of Pain
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. Start combats with 2 Wounds in your draw pile.

name: Mark of the Bloom
description: You can no longer heal. (From Mind Bloom Event)

name: Matryoshka
description: The next 2 non-boss chests you open contain 2 Relics.

name: Maw Bank
description: Whenever you climb a floor, gain 12 Gold. No longer works when you spend any Gold at the shop.

name: Meal Ticket
description: Whenever you enter a shop, heal 15 HP.

name: Meat on the Bone
description: If your HP is at or below 50% at the end of combat, heal 12 HP.

name: Medical Kit
description: Status cards can now be played. Playing a Status will Exhaust the card.

name: Melange
description: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, Scry 3.

name: Membership Card
description: 50% discount on all products.

name: Mercury Hourglass
description: At the start of your turn deal 3 damage to ALL enemies.

name: Molten Egg
description: Whenever you add an Attack card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Mummified Hand
description: Whenever you play a Power card, a random card in your hand costs 0 for the turn.

name: Mutagenic Strength
description: Start each combat with 3 Strength that is lost at the end of your turn. (From Augmenter Event)

name: N'loth's Gift
description: Triples the chance of receiving rare cards as monster rewards. (From N'loth Event)

name: N'loth's Hungry Face
description: The next non-boss chest you open is empty. (From Face Trader Event)

name: Necronomicon
description: The first Attack played each turn that costs 2 or more is played twice. When you take this relic, gain an inescapable Curse. (From Cursed Tome Event)

name: Neow's Lament
description: Enemies in your first 3 combats will have 1 HP. (From Neow Event)

name: Nilry's Codex
description: At the end of each turn, you can choose between 1 of 3 random cards to shuffle into your draw pile. (From Cursed Tome Event)

name: Ninja Scroll
description: Start each combat with 3 Shivs in hand.

name: Nuclear Battery
description: At the start of each combat, Channel 1 Plasma.

name: Nunchaku
description: Every time you play 10 Attacks, gain 1 Energy.

name: Odd Mushroom
description: When Vulnerable, take 25% more damage, rather than 50%. (From Hypnotizing Colored Mushrooms Event)

name: Oddly Smooth Stone
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Dexterity.

name: Old Coin
description: Gain 300 Gold.

name: Omamori
description: Negate the next 2 Curses you obtain.

name: Orange Pellets
description: Whenever you play a Power, Attack, and Skill in the same turn, remove all of your debuffs.

name: Orichalcum
description: If you end your turn without Block, gain 6 Block.

name: Ornamental Fan
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 4 Block.

name: Orrery
description: Choose and add 5 cards to your deck.

name: Pandora's Box
description: Transform all Strikes and Defends.

name: Pantograph
description: At the start of boss combats, heal 25 HP.

name: Paper Crane
description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.

name: Paper Frog
description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

name: Paper Krane
description: Enemies with Weak deal 40% less damage rather than 25%.

name: Paper Phrog
description: Enemies with Vulnerable take 75% more damage rather than 50%.

name: Peace Pipe
description: At Rest Sites, you may now remove a card from your deck.

name: Pear
description: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 10.

name: Pen Nib
description: Every 10th Attack you play deals double damage.

name: Philosopher's Stone
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. ALL enemies start with 1 Strength.

name: Pocketwatch
description: Whenever you play 3 or less cards during your turn, draw 3 additional cards at the start of your next turn.

name: Potion Belt
description: Upon pickup, gain 2 potion slots.

name: Prayer Wheel
description: Normal combats reward an additional card choice.

name: Preserved Insect
description: Enemies in Elite rooms have 25% less HP.

name: Prismatic Shard
description: Combat reward screens now contain colorless cards and cards from other colors.

name: Pure Water
description: At the start of each combat, add a Miracle to your hand.

name: Question Card
description: Upon pickup, obtain a random card. The card can be any rarity and color.

name: Red Mask
description: At the start of each combat, apply 1 Weak to ALL enemies. (From Masked Bandits or Tomb of Lord Red Mask Event)

name: Red Skull
description: While your HP is at or below 50%, you have 3 additional Strength.

name: Regal Pillow
description: Heal an additional 15 HP when you Rest.

name: Ring of the Serpent
description: *Replaces Ring of the Snake* At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card.

name: Ring of the Snake
description: At the start of each combat, draw 2 additional cards.

name: Runic Capacitor
description: Start each combat with 3 additional Orb slots.

name: Runic Cube
description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, draw 1 card.

name: Runic Dome
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer see enemy intents.

name: Runic Pyramid
description: At the end of your turn, you no longer discard your hand.

name: Sacred Bark
description: Double the effectiveness of potions.

name: Self-Forming Clay
description: Whenever you lose HP in combat, gain 3 Block next turn.

name: Shovel
description: At Rest Sites, you may dig for a random Relic.

name: Shuriken
description: Every time you play 3 Attacks in a single turn, gain 1 Strength.

name: Singing Bowl
description: Whenever you choose to skip a card reward, gain 2 Max HP.

name: Slaver's Collar
description: Elite combats are easier. Elites have 50% less HP.

name: Sling of Courage
description: Start each Elite combat with 2 Strength.

name: Smiling Mask
description: The merchant's card removal service now always costs 50 Gold.

name: Snecko Eye
description: Draw 2 additional cards each turn. Start each combat Confused.

name: Snecko Skull
description: Whenever you apply Poison, apply an additional 1 Poison.

name: Sozu
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You can no longer obtain Potions.

name: Spirit Poop
description: It's unpleasant (reduces your final score by 1 point; From the Bonfire Spirits Event.)

name: Ssserpent Head
description: Whenever you enter a ? room, gain 50 Gold. (From Face Trader Event)

name: Stone Calendar
description: Every 7 turns, gain 2 Strength.

name: Strange Spoon
description: Cards which Exhaust when played will instead discard 50% of the time.

name: Strawberry
description: Raise your Max HP by 7.

name: Strike Dummy
description: Cards containing 'Strike' deal 3 additional damage.

name: Sundial
description: Every 3 times you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Energy.

name: Symbiotic Virus
description: At the start of each combat, channel 1 Dark.

name: Teardrop Locket
description: Start each combat in Calm.

name: The Abacus
description: Gain 6 Block whenever you shuffle your draw pile.

name: The Boot
description: Whenever you would deal 4 or less unblocked Attack damage, increase it to 5.

name: The Courier
description: The merchant no longer runs out of cards, relics, or potions and his prices are reduced by 20%.

name: The Specimen
description: Whenever an enemy dies, transfer any Poison it has to a random enemy.

name: Thread and Needle
description: At the start of each combat, gain 4 Plated Armor.

name: Tingsha
description: Whenever you discard a card during your turn, deal 3 damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

name: Tiny Chest
description: Every 4th ? room is a Treasure room.

name: Tiny House
description: Obtain 1 Potion. Gain 50 Gold. Raise your Max HP by 5. Obtain 1 Card. Upgrade 1 Random card.

name: Toolbox
description: At the start of each combat, add a random colorless card to your hand.

name: Torii
description: Whenever you would receive 5 or less unblocked attack damage, reduce it to 1.

name: Tough Bandages
description: Whenever you discard a card, gain 3 Block.

name: Toxic Egg
description: Whenever you add a Skill card to your deck, it is Upgraded.

name: Toxic Egg 2.0
description: Whenever you add a Power to your deck, upgrade it.

name: Toy Ornithopter
description: Whenever you use a potion, heal 5 HP.

name: Tungsten Rod
description: Whenever you would lose HP, lose 1 less.

name: Turnip
description: At the end of combat, heal 5 HP.

name: Twisted Funnel
description: At the start of each combat, apply 4 Poison to ALL enemies.

name: Unceasing Top
description: Whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn, draw a card.

name: Vajra
description: At the start of each combat, gain 1 Strength.

name: Velvet Choker
description: Gain 1 Energy at the start of each turn. You cannot play more than 6 cards per turn.

name: Violet Lotus
description: Whenever you exit Calm, gain an additional Energy.

name: War Paint
description: Whenever you take damage, gain 2 Block.

name: Warped Tongs
description: Whenever you add a card to your deck, you may upgrade it.

name: Whetstone
description: Upon pickup, upgrade 2 random Attacks.

name: White Beast Statue
description: Potions always drop after combat.

name: Wing Boots
description: You may ignore paths when choosing the next room to travel to 3 times.

name: Wrist Blade
description: Attacks that cost 0 deal 4 additional damage.
